title: Cyber PTSD
description: We usually count the damage from a cyberattack in Dollars and Euros, but the psychological damage to the victims is rarely discussed, if at all. So, what is the psychological and emotional toll from cyberattacks? Can scams, hacks, and breaches lead to Cyber Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder?
